name: Plug-In (Maria.a.t.r, tanjatuuli)
description:
We have all heard about the internet of things, but what about the relationship of things (ROT)? Welcome to Plug-It, where ROT is taken to a whole new level…

Credits

Jonne Arjoranta, Raine Koskimaa, Maria Ruotsalainen, Tanja Välisalo
